title: Amcu steward killed in cop clash
description: A union steward was killed in a clash with police at an Amplats mine where workers were holding a strike.

title: Body of ninth Doornkop miner found
description: The body of the last miner missing following a fire in Harmony Gold's Doornkop mine has been found.

title: Wall Street dismisses weak jobs data
description: US stocks edged up as a weak reading on the labour market was partly blamed on the weather.

title: ‘Africans not benefiting from mining operations’
description: The alternative Mining Indaba wants governments and mining companies to be accountable and transparent.

title: Numsa forcing members to oppose alliance
description: Numsa's leadership is pushing ordinary metalworkers into opposing the tripartite alliance, SACP general secretary Blade Nzimande said.

title: SA consumers hit hard by price rises
description: In just six years, the price of most basic foodstuff has doubled. And it will continue to increase, experts warn.

title: Australia central bank upgrades growth forecasts
description: Australia's central bank lifted its economic growth forecastsas the local currency weakened.

title: German exports post surprise fall
description: German exports posted a surprise fall in December, bringing to an end four consecutive monthly gains.

title: Fragile five including SA fight back
description: Countries such as Hungary, lacking the protection of high interest rates, may take the hit from the next selloff wave in emerging markets now bold rate hikes have made the likes of Turkey too costly to bet against.

title: Yahoo shifts Europe tax base
description: Yahoo! is shifting its main European tax base to Ireland from Switzerland.

title: ‘Nigeria set for 6.75% GDP growth’
description: Nigeria is on course for 6.75 percent GDP growth this year, despite political turmoil ahead of 2015 elections, the finance minister told.

title: One killed during Anglo Platinum protest
description: One person died after a "disruptive protest" by striking mine workers at Anglo American Platinum.

title: RBCT coal exports at 4.6m tonnes in January
description: South Africa's Richards Bay Coal Terminal (RBCT) exported 4.6 million tonnes of coal in January compared with 6.8 million tonnes the previous month, RBCT data showed.

title: ECB to gain far-reaching powers
description: The European Central Bank will attain significant powers over the euro zone's commercial banks once it becomes their supervisor later this year.

title: US employment fails to rebound strongly
description: US employers hired far fewer workers than expected in January and job gains for the prior month were barely revised up.
